### 1. Source data
```{r source, warning = TRUE, results = FALSE, message = FALSE}

   library (tidyverse)
   library (janitor) 
   library (spotifyr)

   access_token <- get_spotify_access_token(
      client_id=Sys.getenv("SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID"),
      client_secret=Sys.getenv("SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET")
      )

   songs_raw <- get_my_recently_played(limit = 10) %>% 
      clean_names()
```
   
### 2. Transform data
```{r transform, message = F}

  library (lubridate)
  library (kableExtra)

  songs <- songs_raw %>%
    mutate(
       artist_name = map_chr(track_artists, function(x) x$name[1]),
       played_at = as_datetime(played_at),
       played_at = with_tz(played_at, tzone = "America/Chicago")
       ) %>% 
    select(artist_name, track_name, track_album_name, played_at) %>% 
    kable()
```
